root.name: Samurai Warriors 4
root.description: OverviewSamurai Warriors 4 is currently planned for release in Japan by Tecmo Koei in February of 2014. The release date marks the tenth anniversary of the inception of the Samurai Warriors series. It is due out on both PlayStation 3 and Vita.GameplaySamurai Warriors 4 will offer over fifty playable characters. The game will feature a character-switching mechanic similar to Samurai Warriors: Chronicles on the 3DS; the player can alternate control between two characters on the battlefield. There is also a new mode that uses a player-created character.The primary story mode will tell of he unification of Japan from the perspective of Yukimura Sanada, with a secondary story that tells history from the perspective of another, as yet unknown character.
